subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Anyone else offended by C2C?
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-545293967-1254018398=:73059
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

LOL April no kidding. I think maybe what he means is HE will go crazy if HE=
 tries. LOL that statement says alot. You might go crazy with or without do=
ing spirit communication. You might do alot of things. You might jump off a=
 tall building some day. You might die tomorrow. Might and will are words b=
ased on=A0ones own theories of what "could" happen.
=A0
I think if you take=
 a look around you will find a number of respectable people, scholars, inve=
ntors, teachers, policemen, firemen, military, clergy, and prominent figure=
s in our society have had personal experiences which force them to disagree=
 with that statement. In fact the bible is full of them (for those who take=
 them at their word) as are most histories and cultures worldwide. So milli=
ons of people are crazy or one guy is wrong....hmm tough decision but again=
 try it for yourself before you form YOUR opinion people =3D) I did and I h=
ave my own experiences to rely on.
=A0
Misty

--- On Sat, 9/26/09, April Ab=
ercrombie <april@...> wrote:


From: April Abercro=
mbie <april@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Anyone els=
e offended by C2C?
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Saturday, September 26=
, 2009, 9:49 PM


=A0 




My problem is as you said...the BS, like "you'll=
 go crazy if you try to speak with the dead." He has no real evidence to ba=
ck that statement up. It is purely just his belief.
=A0
If he said, "In my =
opinion...." or " I believe..."=A0then I would still disagree, but it would=
n't put a burr under my blanket LOL!
=A0

----- Original Message ----- 
Fro=
m: Misty Dawn 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Saturday, September 26, =
2009 7:41 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Anyone else offended by C2C?

=A0 




=


This is why I tell everyone don't take my word for it try it for yourself=
. Communication with something beyond yourself is a personal endeavor. Step=
hen Rorke makes his living on hoax news and to him this is news. I can't bl=
ame anyone for questioning the reality around them. But I can take a look a=
t what else a person has had to contribute to the world and the feild of st=
udy they claim to be in.=A0 I suggest you all do the same before you take s=
omeones ideas and make them your own. He has a right to form his own opinio=
n, experiment and get his own results, and believe whatever he wishes. But =
so do I.
=A0
Based on my own experiments, my own results, my own experience=
s, I form=A0MY own opinions and beliefs. As for the spiricom communication =
device all I can say is its interesting but I was not there, I did not expe=
riement with it, I have no results with which to base an opinion on. All we=
 have left is some recorded data, and heresay.
=A0
As for=A0Frank's box and=
 Sweep Tuning I can say I have seen the results, I have experimented with S=
T myself and I have received some astounding results which are message comm=
unications that are outside of my own knowledge and my own ability to contr=
ol or create. I have used many methods for EVP and ITC and have had many in=
teresting results that have been confirmed, recognized, and proved beyond a=
 shadow of=A0MY own doubt. This is=A0MY personal experience and I invite an=
yone who wishes to know more to try it for themselves and get their own res=
ults rather than waste time trying to pick apart others ideas, theories or =
results. I never try and prove anything to anyone else because for each of =
us it takes that one very personal experience to have that eye opening mome=
nt and realize that there is more around us than what is apparent.
=A0
So n=
o I am not offended by anything anyone has to say as long as they base thie=
r statements on truth rather than BS. And we all know there are alot of peo=
ple who make their life revolve around the BS as well as try to profit from=
 it.
=A0
My best advice would be to try it in depth before you form an opin=
ion. Your results may differ from others, your personal experience may not =
be the same but that is YOUR experience, not mine, to explore further.
=A0
=
My journey has been quite fascinating, educational, and enlightening. I cou=
ld only hope that everyone else has a similar path, but we each have our ow=
n roads to travel.
=A0
Misty


--- On Sat, 9/26/09, purplespacefriend <purp=
lealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrote:


From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ =
gmail.com>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Anyone else offended by C2C?
To: EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups .com
Date: Saturday, September 26, 2009, 8:29 PM


=A0 

Art Bell w=
as filling in, and he had a guest that supposedly worked with Spiricom. The=
 bottom line was the guy thought Spiricom was faked and he used that as a w=
ay of implying all EVP was faked, at least that's the way I took it, and he=
 connected the boxes to Spiricom, implying they also did not work. Not only=
 that, it was implied that if one speaks to the dead, one goes insane! I wa=
s out raged! As usual though Art Bell, and C2C never answer e-mails, and co=
ntinue to act like they are the last word on anything paranormal, turning i=
nto more of debunking agency than anything informative. The thinking of the=
 listeners, I think, is being carefully guided and manipulated. Radio remai=
ns only good for a source of raw audio, and not any meaningful information =
or dialog. 

These "researchers" /debunkers never check any facts, never ch=
eck with anyone that makes or uses the equipment, they just pass their opin=
ions off as facts. If they actuyally honelstly tested this technology they =
would be singing a different tune, but I supposed they are not paid to be h=
onest. 

Frank-S
